name: 王聖銘
objective:
文化創意產業的發展是目前創新產業發展的趨勢。本課程將從知識管理的角度與觀點探討文化創意產業知識的管理與知識資產的建置。本課程首先將定義何謂文化創意產業，其次將探討如何導入知識管理的概念架構與技術，針對所選定的文化創意產業案例及主題，做知識經營層面及知識資產的創造與應用分析。並評估文化創意產業知識管理導入的方式，與知識加值應用與評估的方法。本課程的主要目標除提供創意與互動設計研究所，知識管理的基礎理論基礎外，也將透過文化創意產業之創新案例及主題，提供同學發展知識管理實務的實務經驗。
The development of Cultural Creative Industries is nowadays becoming a fashion of innovation industrial development. This course will discuss how to manage the knowledge asset and create their values in Cultural Creative Industries from the perspective of knowledge management. This course will begin with the discussion on the definition of the Cultural Creative Industries. Then, follow the discussion on how to introduce the basic knowledge management framework and technologies to analyze, evaluate and create the values of the knowledge assets in Cultural Creative Industries. The main objective of this course will provide students practical experiences on the implementation of knowledge management in Cultural Creative Industries through various case studies in different categories.
